trans-unit.source: Derives a key from a password using an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PBKDF1 演算法的擴充功能，從密碼衍生金鑰。

trans-unit.source: This class uses an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm defined in the PKCS#5 v2.0 standard to derive bytes suitable for use as key material from a password.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會使用 PBKDF1 演算法的 PKCS #5 v2.0 標準中定義的延伸模組，從密碼衍生適用於作為金鑰內容的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The standard is documented in IETF RRC 2898.
trans-unit.target: 標準記載於 IETF RRC 2898 中。

trans-unit.source: Never hard-code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Hard coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) tool, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor like notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可使用的組件從擷取的硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)工具、 十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟文字編輯器 （例如 notepad.exe) 中的組件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a key from a password using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會從密碼使用建立機碼<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The password to derive the key for.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class specifying the password and key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來衍生金鑰的密碼和金鑰 Salt，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a key from a password using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會從密碼使用建立機碼<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes>類別。

trans-unit.source: The password for which to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class with the password and key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 使用用來衍生金鑰的密碼和金鑰 Salt，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Never hard-code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Hard coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) tool, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor like notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可使用的組件從擷取的硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)工具、 十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟文字編輯器 （例如 notepad.exe) 中的組件。

trans-unit.source: The password to derive the key for.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 作業的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class specifying the password, key salt, and cryptographic service provider (CSP) to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來衍生金鑰的密碼、金鑰 Salt 和密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) l, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) l、 十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a key from a password using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會從密碼使用建立機碼<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes>類別。

trans-unit.source: The password for which to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

trans-unit.source: The CSP parameters for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 用於操作的 CSP 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class with the password, key salt, and cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 使用用來衍生金鑰的密碼、金鑰 Salt 和密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Never hard-code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Hard coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) tool, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor like notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可使用的組件從擷取的硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)工具、 十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟文字編輯器 （例如 notepad.exe) 中的組件。

trans-unit.source: The password to derive the key for.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 要用來衍生金鑰的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: The iteration count to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的反覆計數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class specifying the password, key salt, hash name, and iterations to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來衍生金鑰的密碼、金鑰 Salt、雜湊名稱和反覆運算，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of hash algorithm names, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需雜湊演算法名稱的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。

trans-unit.source: The password for which to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 用於操作的雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The number of iterations for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 操作的重複次數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class with the password, key salt, hash name, and number of iterations to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 使用用來衍生金鑰的密碼、金鑰 Salt、雜湊名稱和重複次數，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Never hard-code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Hard coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) tool, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor like notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可使用的組件從擷取的硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)工具、 十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟文字編輯器 （例如 notepad.exe) 中的組件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of hash algorithm names, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需雜湊演算法名稱的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。

trans-unit.source: The password to derive the key for.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 要用來衍生金鑰的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: The iteration count to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的反覆計數。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 作業的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP) 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class specifying the password, key salt, hash name, iterations, and cryptographic service provider (CSP) to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來衍生金鑰的密碼、金鑰 Salt、雜湊名稱、反覆運算和密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of hash algorithm names, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需雜湊演算法名稱的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。

trans-unit.source: The password for which to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The key salt to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 用於操作的雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The number of iterations for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 操作的重複次數。

trans-unit.source: The CSP parameters for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 用於操作的 CSP 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class with the password, key salt, hash name, number of iterations, and cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 使用用來衍生金鑰的密碼、金鑰 Salt、雜湊名稱、重複次數和密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Never hard-code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Hard coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) tool, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor like notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可使用的組件從擷取的硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)工具、 十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟文字編輯器 （例如 notepad.exe) 中的組件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of hash algorithm names, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需雜湊演算法名稱的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>類別。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm name for which to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm name to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 要用來衍生金鑰的雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The size of the key, in bits, to derive.
trans-unit.target: 要衍生的金鑰大小 (以位元為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector (IV) to use to derive the key.
trans-unit.target: 用來衍生金鑰的初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: Derives a cryptographic key from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 物件衍生密碼編譯金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The derived key.
trans-unit.target: 所衍生金鑰。

trans-unit.source: This function is a wrapper for the Crypto API function CryptDeriveKey(), and is intended to offer interoperability with applications using the Crypto API.
trans-unit.target: 此函式是 Crypto API 函式 CryptDeriveKey()，包裝函式，為了提供互通性與使用 Crypto API 的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If the `keySize` parameter is set to 0 bits, the default key size for the specified algorithm is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`keySize`參數設定為 0 位元時，使用指定的演算法的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="keySize" /> parameter is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keySize" /> 參數不正確。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 無法取得密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="algname" /> parameter is not a valid algorithm name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algname" /> 參數不是有效的演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="alghashname" /> parameter is not a valid hash algorithm name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="alghashname" /> 參數不是有效的雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> class and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes" /> 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: `Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see langword="Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see langword="Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: The number of pseudo-random key bytes to generate.
trans-unit.target: 要產生的似隨機金鑰位元組數量。

trans-unit.source: Returns pseudo-random key bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回似隨機金鑰位元組。

trans-unit.source: A byte array filled with pseudo-random key bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，以虛擬隨機金鑰位元組填入。

trans-unit.source: This method can create any number of pseudo-random bytes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以建立任意數目的虛擬隨機位元組。

trans-unit.source: However, the strength of the byte sequence is limited by the number of bytes in the hash output.
trans-unit.target: 不過，雜湊輸出中的位元組數目受限於位元組序列的強度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the hash algorithm for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於操作的雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 用於操作的雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash value is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊值 (Hash Value) 的名稱是固定的，並且會嘗試變更這個值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of iterations for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定操作的重複次數。

trans-unit.source: The number of iterations for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 操作的重複次數。

trans-unit.source: The number of iterations is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.
trans-unit.target: 重複次數是固定的，並且會嘗試變更這個值。

trans-unit.source: The property cannot be set because its value is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定此屬性，因為它的值超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: This property requires a non-negative number.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性需要非負數的數字。

trans-unit.source: Resets the state of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 重設作業的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

trans-unit.source: The key salt value for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary attack is an attack in which the attacker attempts to decrypt an encrypted message by comparing the encrypted value with previously computed encrypted values for the most likely keys.
trans-unit.target: 字典攻擊是攻擊者嘗試藉由比較加密的值與最可能的索引鍵的先前計算加密值解密加密的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This attack is made much more difficult by the introduction of random bytes at the end of the password before the key derivation.
trans-unit.target: 這種攻擊會由導入的密碼金鑰衍生之前的結尾的隨機位元組更為困難。

trans-unit.source: These random bytes are known as salt.
trans-unit.target: 這些隨機位元組稱為 salt。

trans-unit.source: The key salt value is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰 Salt 值是固定的，並且會嘗試變更這個值。
